label: notifiedParty
comment: A party to be notified about this logistics transport movement.
A party who has been or will be notified about this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A party who has been or will be notified about this referenced supply chain consignment.
A party who has been or will be notified about this supply chain consignment.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
The conveyance (physical carriage) of people, animals, goods, or other objects from place to place.
